instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165A
threads.message: fan spin, No p1v05s0 and no cpuvr what should i check?

threads.title: 820-00165A
threads.message:
ALL_SYS_PWRGD goes high?
Do you get voltage on the other big coils?

threads.title: 820-00165A
threads.message: Thank you, it was r7612 i replaced it getting all voltage but no back light 22.8v on c7799 i test with working screen it's same and r7704 1.4v any idea?

threads.title: 820-00165A
threads.message: Try PRAM reset 2-3 times, then check pressing backlight up key.

threads.title: 820-00165A
threads.message: it was u7701 replaced it working fine thank you
